name: Start the dashboard on the HDMI output when booted up
Initialise power button / switches states to off
Start Chromium If It Is Not Running
Tell User what bot can do
Tell User what bot can do

format: handlebars
template:
Hey! Im Harrys brew bot! I can help you by running commands when you are away from home. I can also give you updates on how things are going.

Have fun! üëç

Ask for /help to see what I can do.

format: handlebars
template:
/start - Start conversation with me
/help - Ask me what I can do
/warm_up - Ill warm up the water for you while you‚Äôre away
/stop - Emergency stop. will stop all outputs to pumps and heaters
/open_tunnel - Start ssh tunnel for remote access to node red when away from the home
/close_all_tunnels - Stop all tunnel connections
/shut_down - Shut me down so you can properly remove power
/reboot - Reboot me if something isnt working right

name: Check if msg has parameters
No parameters
format: handlebars
template:
What IP should I connect to? Please tell me by running the command again, with the IP as the next word
eg: /open_tunnel 1.2.3.4

name: Ask the user to provide an IP address
Create tunnel command
Set feedback message
Set feedback message
func:
msg.payload = "The SSH connections have been terminated. Details: " + msg.rc.message

return msg;

name: Tell user we have stopped output

format: handlebars
template:
Outputs have been stopped. üõë

To reset the outputs, do it at the brew dashboard.

Hope everything is ok!

name: Tell user we have stopped output

format: handlebars
template:
No worries. Im warming the water up for you now. üëç

If you want an update on the tempurature, just ask for a /water_temperature_status

name: TO DO: Actually start the warm program
Tell user we are shutting down

format: handlebars
template:
Bye bye! Shutting the Pi down now.

Power it back up if you want me to be able to talk again!

name: TO DO: Actually enable the emergency stop
Confirm shutdown
question: Are you sure you want to shut the Pi down?

name: Double Confirm shutdown
question: Are you really really sure you want to shut the Pi down?
answers: Yes Im really sure!! Shut down

format: handlebars
template:
Bye bye! Rebooting the Pi now.

I should be back in a few minutes!

name: Confirm reboot
question: Are you sure you want to reboot the Pi?

name: Double Confirm reboot
question: Are you really really sure you want to reboot the Pi?

format: handlebars
template:
Hi! Im back online now.

You can find me at either of these addresses (you need to be on the same wifi as me):
http://harrysbrewpi.local:1880/
http://{{payload}}:1880/

Dashboard:
http://harrysbrewpi.local:1880/ui
http://{{payload}}:1880/ui

Feel free to ask for /help

name: Remove line break
func:
msg.payload = msg.payload.trim();
return msg;

name: Get HLT Temp value
func:
msg.payload = msg.payload.hlt
return msg;

name: 30 sec RC + 20
10 sec RC
2 msg transport delay
Clear all except payload
func:
msg2 = {payload: msg.payload};
return msg2;

name: switch controller
Button styles
format:
<style>
.custom-switch-button {
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    justify-content: center;
    cursor: pointer;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    align-items: center;
    background-color: var(--nr-dashboard-widgetColor);
    color: var(--nr-dashboard-widgetTextColor);
    border-radius: 2px;
    font-weight: 500;
    font-size: 14px;
    line-height: 36px;
}
.custom-switch-button:hover {
    /*background-color: #0b8f95;  */
    filter: brightness(120%);
}
.custom-switch-button:focus {
    outline: none;
    border: 0;
}
</style>

name: switch controller
POWER
format: POWER

name: switch controller
Enable power switch
format: {{(msg.payload) ? 'ENABLED' : 'ENABLE'}}

name: switch controller
HLT Power enabled
format: {{(msg.payload) ? 'ENABLED' : 'ENABLE'}}

format: ¬∞C

func:

return msg;

name: Global styles for dashboard
format:
<style>
@media only screen and (min-width: 1800px) {
    .masonry-container {
        margin-top: 205px;
        transform: scale(1.7); 
    }
    
}
h1.vessel-title {
    font-size: 2.9em;
    margin-top: -10px;
    margin-bottom: -10px;
}
    
.custom-switch-button {
    overflow: hidden;
}
</style>
